bibl.title: The Composition of Ptolemaic Silver
bibl.note: Presents an analysis of 141 Ptolemaic silver pieces and discusses its implications for the role of the stater during the second and first centuries B.C.

bibl.title: The Journal of the Society for the Study of Egyptian Antiquities

bibl.seg: HAZZARD R.A., The Composition of Ptolemaic Silver.
Presents an analysis of 141 Ptolemaic silver pieces and discusses its implications for the role of the stater during the second and first centuries B.C.
